trans-unit.source: Provides methods for manipulating the Clipboard.
Items moved or copied to the Clipboard persist even after the application is shut down.
Data on the Clipboard can be in any data format, also called a Clipboard format.
For a list of predefined formats to use with the Clipboard, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>.
When an item is moved or copied to the Clipboard, items in other formats are cleared.
To make other formats persist, use <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VariantType>, which copies everything existing on the current Clipboard, including items pasted from other applications.
Place data on the Clipboard in multiple formats to maximize the possibility that a target application, whose format requirements you might not know, can successfully retrieve the data.
Because all Windows applications share the system Clipboard, the contents may change when you switch to another application.
A class must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard.
See [Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
When accessing the Clipboard remotely, a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException> is thrown unless the accessing thread operates in STA (single-threaded apartment) mode.
To resolve this issue, set the `ThreadApartmentState` to `STA`.
For more information, see <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>.
For more information, see [Storing Data to and Reading from the Clipboard](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
Clears the Clipboard.

The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission> class controls access to the Clipboard, and the associated <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard> enumeration value indicates the level of access.
For more information, see [Additional Security Considerations in Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
Indicates whether the Clipboard contains audio data.

## Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if audio data is stored on the Clipboard; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
Indicates whether the Clipboard contains data in the specified custom format.
If you have placed custom formatted data on the Clipboard, this method allows you to check the Clipboard for data in that format.

Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>.
Name of the custom format to be checked.
Required.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if data in the specified custom format is stored on the Clipboard; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> indicating whether the Clipboard contains a file drop list.
A file drop list is a collection of strings containing path information for files.

Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if a file drop list is stored on the Clipboard; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> indicating whether an image is stored on the Clipboard.

## Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if an image is stored on the Clipboard; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
Determines if there is text on the Clipboard.
Possible formats are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat>.

Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the Clipboard contains text; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
Determines if there is text on the Clipboard.
Possible formats are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat>.

Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat"></xref>.
If specified, identifies what text format to be checked for.
Required.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the Clipboard contains text; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
Retrieves an audio stream from the Clipboard.

## Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object containing audio data or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> if the Clipboard does not contain any audio data.
Retrieves data in a custom format from the Clipboard.

## Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>.
Name of the data format.
Required.

An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref> representing the Clipboard data or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> if the Clipboard does not contain any data that is in the specified format or can be converted to that format.
Retrieves data from the Clipboard as an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject"></xref>.
This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab.

Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|

An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject"></xref> object that represents the data currently on the Clipboard, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> if there is no data on the Clipboard.
Retrieves a collection of strings representing file names from the Clipboard.
This method is available only for non-server applications.
A file drop list is a collection of strings containing path information for files.

Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|

A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> containing file names or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> if the Clipboard does not contain any data that is in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.FileDrop"></xref> format or can be converted to that format.
Retrieves an image from the Clipboard.

## Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|

An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> representing the Clipboard image data or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> if the Clipboard does not contain any data that is in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Bitmap"></xref> format or can be converted to that format.
Retrieves text from the Clipboard.
Possible formats are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat>.

Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|

The Clipboard text data or an empty string if the Clipboard does not contain data in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat"></xref> format, depending on the operating system.
Retrieves text from the Clipboard.
Possible formats are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat>.

Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat"></xref>.
If specified, identifies what text format should be retrieved.
Default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat"></xref>.
Required.
The Clipboard text data or an empty string if the Clipboard does not contain data in the specified format.
Writes audio data to the Clipboard.
> [!IMPORTANT] > Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data.

Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
<xref uid="langword_csharp_Byte" name="Byte" href=""></xref> array.
Audio data to be written to the Clipboard.
Required.
Writes audio data to the Clipboard.
> [!IMPORTANT] > Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data.

Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
<xref:System.IO.Stream> Audio data to be written to the clipboard.
Required.
Writes data in a custom format to the Clipboard.
> [!IMPORTANT] > Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data.

Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>.
Format of data.
Required.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>.
Data object to be written to the Clipboard.
Required.
Writes a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataObject"></xref> to the Clipboard.
This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab.
> [!IMPORTANT] > Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data.

Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataObject"></xref>.
Data object to be written to the Clipboard.
Required.
Writes a collection of strings representing file paths to the Clipboard.
A file drop list is a collection of strings representing file names.
> [!IMPORTANT] > Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data.

Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref>.
List of file names.
Required.
Writes an image to the Clipboard.
> [!IMPORTANT] > Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data.

Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
Image to be written.
Required.
Writes text to the Clipboard.
Possible formats are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat>.
Previous Clipboard formats are not preserved.
> [!IMPORTANT] > Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data.

Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>.
Text to be written.
Required.
text is an empty string.
text is .
Writes text to the Clipboard.
Possible formats are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat>.
Previous Clipboard formats are not preserved.
> [!IMPORTANT] > Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data.

Availability by Project Type |Project type|Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>.
Text to be written.
Required.
<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat"></xref>.
Format to be used when writing text.
Default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat"></xref>.
Required.
text is an empty string.
text is .
